articles.title: Data find more Americans lost to COVID-19 than 1918 flu pandemic - eNCA
articles.description: The latest grim milestone comes as the country is experiencing a fourth wave driven by the highly contagious Delta variant.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON - Despite a century of medical advances, more Americans have now died from Covid-19 than the number who succumbed to the 1918 flu pandemic, according to new data.
